summary: Overhaul to distribute loot in a believable manner.
descriptionHtml:
I have been playing ES games since Morrowind. And I love them.
Still, since Oblivion, the LevelledLists have brought a plague of nonsensical loot distribution.
So, to prevent a thief from assaulting me for 100 Gold while wearing full glass, I\'ve ventured forth into the unknown territory of LL editing.

The fruit of my first 2 hours of hard work with the CK is this little WIP mod. If I have done it right, no normal (non-boss) bandit should wield any weapon of a higher material than steel.
